reviews.text: stew chicken was awful, the chicken flavorless and tough, the rice over cooked.  I threw out the food fear of getting sick.

I love this restaurant, not only is the food amazing (my fav is chicken Rasta pasta) I get for my Mom brown stew chicken lunch portion all in the evening because she doesn‚Äôt eat much and the amazing servers work with what I want for her. The restaurant is always clean and the service is above and beyond. When on Williamsbridge Road and Lydig Ave, stop by to get some great food!!!!‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è
Great food classic Bronx Magwan spot .
Great customer service, always greeted with a smile.  The food was pretty good.
Spent over 50 dollars for two meals just to go in the garbage. Foods absolutely nasty waited so long for my order to be delivered just to taste like shit.
Fresh and hot. Made to order. Chef asked me if I wanted my pasta spicy and it was just the right amount of heat. So good. This is my new go to spot.

For $18 and some change getting scraps of chicken is diabolical‚Ä¶. I ordered chicken Rasta pasta and ain‚Äôt get no chicken‚Ä¶ I‚Äôm not coming back

Total disappointment. Video is attached
Food is always fresh and staff are super nice. They are very generous with their portions. Highly recommended üëå
My first time eating their and I have no regrets, authentic Jamaican food, and the portion was worth the money too. I would go back there again whenever I am in the area.

The food here is absolutely amazing. You get tasty, fresh delicious meals with Caribbean vibes. I had the jerk chicken sandwich, the chicken was perfectly seasoned, the veggies were fresh and crisp. Also, staff were so friendly and polite. This is my go to spot for great food! 100000/10

Absolutely amazing food!! The oxtail melts in your mouth. To anyone who may be new to the Caribbean cuisine,  try the lunch specials and you won't be disappointed. I make the 15 minute drive from Wakefield (a largely Caribbean neighborhood in fact) just to order from here. Simply the best.

I found this hidden gem by googling what was in the area to eat. Based off the reviews, I decided to see what the hype was about and trust, they did not disappoint. I had a jerk chicken wrap with fries and my daughter had fruity pebbles waffle and chicken. We also ordered ackee and saltfish empanadas and beef empanadas and babyyyyy everything was perfection.. 10/10. The food came out fast, the service was on point, and the food was top tier. I will definitely be back and I will be telling everyone about this place.
The food was delicious and excellent service!  Jerk pork and rice and peas was delicious! Excellent catering service!

Ordered catering for my sister‚Äôs baby shower, everything was amazing. The Jerk Pork was a fan favorite. Orain is a phenomenal chef and has amazing customer service. Will definitely recommend to my family & friends!
Went here for lunch. The empanadas and macaroni and cheese were tasty. The location was clean. The customer service was excellent - very polite and friendly.
Best of the best I love this place food is amazing place is neat clean wonderful restaurant

Very gooood !!! Service 10/10

Food come out fresh & fast !
My experience was amazing the food was great and especially in that area definitely that‚Äôs the place to go I do recommend‚Ä¶..also the oxtail empanadas just wow!!!!!!
The stew chicken is amazing, customer service was beyond and above. It was my daughter‚Äôs first time  experiencing Jamaican food and she loved it.
Kenmar & his team are welcoming & provide great recommendations. Allows you to have a variety of food options.
Excellent selection of Caribbean/American food. It‚Äôs light and it‚Äôs moderate portions. The service is great and they are patient to accommodate you when you order.

Would recommend this place to everyone. The staff is very nice and the food gets to you quick. Everyone should try the oxtail empanadas they‚Äôre juicy and so flavorful. The jerk chicken is amazing as well. This is the best spot for Jamaican food!

Food is terrible.
Waste of my money
really good chicken rasta pasta and very welcoming people. i would love to come back!
its a very good place service friendly food 10/10
The food here is excellent and the service is awesome!! I had the fruity pebble waffles with the fried Whiting. It was delicious. I would recommend anybody to get it when they come here.
Orain was very friendly, professional and curteous!
Great customer service & quality food
Very good food and has all been friendly
I love the food and the variety of the food. Great customer service.
Delicious Jamaican food. Omg and those empanadas so Yummy.
10/10 ! Service was fast & amazing ! Food is amazing ! everything is well flavored ! don‚Äôt walk ! R U N !
Great customer service. Food taste amazing!! Have to try here
They have the best food in the Bronx, 10/10. I definitely recommend visiting this location.

Waffles were soft and fluffy, the Chicken was cooked well and basically fell off the bone and the milkshake were good sizes and just the right sweetness! Highly recommended, would definitely come here again!
The food here is amazing, get the oxtails !!

Food was delicious i got the crispy chicken and bacon waffle slider/w fries chicken empanadas and beef empanadas food was hot and cooked thoroughly me and my mother happened to be the only ones in the restaurant and a young man with locs served us wish i got his name he even cooked out food üòÉ
One of the best Jamaican restaurants around, it‚Äôs a must try <3
Food was amazing, definitely will come back and definitely will recommend. I got a large meal which filled me up and still had some for later.

Everything on the menu is outstandingly delicious! I‚Äôve had all the salmon styles, the chicken wings, Escovitch fish, Rasta pasta, jerked chicken, dumplings, waffles, shakes, and the amazing empanadas‚Ä¶.EVERYTHING is top-notch delicious. Also they are a family place and I love that after eating to my hearts fullest content I‚Äôm also supporting this small business. Check out the menu, you can close your eyes and pick a great meal - definitely highly recommend D‚ÄôMelting Pot to anyone who likes flavorful food that is filling and does not leave you feeling sick.

Great people , great food ,

Amazing oxtail empanadas !!!!
Completely delicious!!

Just ordered there for the first time. Not really impressed with the food. Ordered oxtail pasta. The pasta was overcooked to the point where it wouldn't even stay on the plastic fork, the pasta turned into mush. Also the pasta was bland. Oxtails bland. The shrimp empanadas were ok though.
Nice clean restaurant, good area, and the food is amazing. Hits the soul ‚ú®
Anmarie and the entire staff are always delightful, greet me warmly and make the food with love. I enjoy the food and the atmosphere. Unique and delicious. Stay great!

They have the best tasting empanada that I every taste. I had the oxtail empanada and I ask the server to give me the next best and he gave me the ackee and saltfish empanada, he didn't make a mistake. Omg they are so scrumptious. Well seasoned and all. Love it and I would definitely recommend D'melting pot after trying for the first time. Finger licking good.
The service is always great, The food is delicious. Oxtail melts in your mouth. Thank you for always being kind.
Delicious!
Absolutely love this place
Great service, and delicious food.

Outstanding portions & flavors for the prices. They also follow instructions that are often overlooked when ordering online & it is so much appreciated. I can not wait to heal & get the time for my wife & I to dine in. Here's a few pics of what I've been addicted to for the past week & a half. Lol!

Great people and food is slapping.

Oxtail was fire. Fries are amazing.

Jerk chicken sandwich might be a once in a while buy.

More dishes to try and will be back.

First time I ordered 5 sevings Oxtail w plantains for my visitors, the following day Rasta Pasta for me. I must say the Oxtail didn't make it past 1 hour of serving, the Rasta Pasta with shrimp was for me alone what a pleasure to my taste buds.

The restaurant itself is small, has about 5/6 tables to dine in. I‚Äôve only ordered to go so I can‚Äôt speak on dine in service but the food is delicious. We needed a restaurant like this in the area I hope it stays around.

Got the 6 piece bbq wings w a side of fries for only $13.82. Big portion for a good price. The staff was super friendly and welcoming. Very clean and well kept, also has a few dining tables. Food tasted amazing and definitely recommend.
This place was so great. The customer service was amazing. The food was so good and the portion sizes were much bigger than I expected. I'm surprised it doesn't have more people.
I work in the area and I must say, this is one of the BEST places to eat. The service there is excellent, the staff are friendly and welcoming and the food is EXCELLENT.
The food was amazing the oxtail Rasta pasta had so much flavor. The food took a little long but there was only one person working taking care of everything, he was very kind.
Just got takeout. Oxtails with rice and peas with steamed vegetables. Excellent food. Friendly staff. Good meaty and flavorful oxtails. I'll be back.

My wife was in the mood for some oxtails so I made a stop at this location on a Saturday evening. I was not disappointed! Everything was prepared freshly and flavorful. We had the oxtail pasta as well as the oxtail empanadas they were both packed with flavor. The portions are also very generous and the pricing is reasonable! I am very excited to find such a great hidden gem so close to home.

My husband picked up an order of oxtail and rice and peas and was raving about the dish. I tried it. It was amazing!

I have a very picky palate.

Everything was seasoned (rice peas and steamed vegetables) perfectly and the oxtail meat fell off the bones! Beef patty is fabulous!  Jerk chicken very wonderful as well!

This will definitely be my weekly take out!!

Staff is very gracious!

This was my first time ordering after recommendation from my daughter. I got the BBQ chicken wings with rice and peas and shrimp empanada. I have to say the BBQ wings were delicious. The BBQ sauce was on point. The rice and peas was delicious had good flavor and the shrimp empanada was delicious. Definitely my new place to frequent. The person who took care of me was very nice and definitely a great cook. Forgot to ask for the name but you know who you are. My daughter got the oxtail pasta and she said it was it was awesome üëç Will definitely recommend to family and friends.

First time me and my boyfriend had came to this place and when I say the chef stood on business with everything he was telling us he meant it. Me and my boyfriend had the chicken Rasta pasta by the way chicken was cooked great everything was so flavorful! My boyfriend also had the Mac and cheese that he couldn‚Äôt stop eating from the first bite. Oh and I also ordered the oxtail empanadas, I‚Äôm not an oxtail fan but these empanadas were soooo amazing. Definitely going back! I would‚Äôve added some pictures but we ate too fast next time I will just add some pics.

Ima be completely honest.....I've had better. It wasn't bad at all, but it wasn't great üòï For starters there was absolutely no gravy on the oxtails or rice, making the rice dry. Some of the oxtails were also a bit rough. The portion of food was very filling üíØ It tasted as if there was molasses in there but not enough. I would like to give this establishment another try but I'd rather just save my money & make my own next time or go all the way to Brooklyn to order from Footprints. The oxtail empanadas were really good. üëå

I gave 3 stars because I was disappointed üòû üòî

Just had to actually call the place to tell them how good I thought the food was. I got the oxtail empanadas which were juicy not dry in anyway and the jerk chicken with rice and peas. The sauces that came with the empanada ,and I think the chicken, were so good as well which paired excellently, I only wish I had more chicken, but not because of the portion size, but because of how good it was. I don‚Äôt have any photos to share because it‚Äôs all gone. üòÇ

I greatly enjoyed this new restaurant. It brought a well needed Caribbean touch to this area. The food was great & the staff were friendly and inviting. The chef even came out to greet us and to thank us for our service. Will definitely be coming back.

The place is very clean but won't buy food from there anymore. Bought curry goat. Meat was very tender but with no flavor and lacking the taste of curry. I know a good thick seasoning when i see it and this wasnt it. The amount of rice to meat was RIDICULOUS. I had about 5 pieces of meat with rice to feed 3 people.

Food was good. Dumplings reminded me of my grandma cooking in Jamaica. Ackee and salt-fish was succulent. Also I had the the pineapple and guava tropical rhythm drink. Flavor was amazing. 10/10 would recommend a friend.

Stopped by this spot while doing our taxes next door, and boy am I happy that I did. I‚Äôve been looking for a good Caribbean restaurant for a while now and I just found my new go to spot. I recommend this spot to anyone! The food here is spectacular! They have some of the best oxtail I have ever had. The oxtail empanadas are a must try, it is so tender and jam packed with flavor. Their callaloo and saltfish is great too. On top of that we also got the shrimp Mac and cheese, and that was pretty delicious as well - very moist and flavorful!

I live in queens but I will gladly travel here any day for this amazing food. On top of that, we got to meet Orain and Angela and they were so nice and personable. We had such a genuine conversation and looking forward to another interaction with them just made it more of a no brainer to come back!

Food was absolutely phenomenal! We got Rasta Pasta with Chicken, Jerk Chicken Sandwich, Kids Chicken Wings, Curry Chicken with Rice and Peas! Can we use the word PERFECTION ü´∂üèº! To top it of the staff is so nice, welcoming, and they take their time! We will be back!

I loveeee loveee loveee this restaurant!!!‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è The food is so tasteful!! The fusion between Jamaican cuisine and American cuisine is brilliant!! The best of both worlds ..a lot of different options to choose from!! Their ackee and salt fish empanada is to die for ..I feel like I‚Äôm back home in Jamaica!!! And don‚Äôt forget the mango smoothie with a hint of ginger!!!! They pay attention to details..and you can tell by the quality and quantity of the food portion ..it match the price you pay!! That was very important to me ..Omgggg the best restaurant all my coworkers love it!! the service is excellent‚Ä¶the staff is professional and sweet‚Ä¶.I recommend this restaurant 10 times over üíØüíØüíØ

I am extremely excited about the new addition to the food option in the area: Jamaican restaurant is a must in any New York City neighbourhood. I have tried only one dish thus far, starting with ackee and saltfish, of course. I was very good, so I cannot wait to try more of their other fish options! The people working there are amazing, very welcoming, great to talk to, and attentive. Very much looking forward to making this one of my favourite spots!
Absolutely delicious. Inquire about their catering service. Food is amazing
